subject: [junit]Help me!
msgSnippet: hello, JUnit users I am a Junit user in China. I found 《unit test in java》really helpful but I couldn t get it from local bookstore because of copyright
messageBody:
hello, JUnit users

I am a Junit user in China. I found 《unit test in java》really helpful but I couldn't get it from local bookstore because of copyright issue. Dos anybody know whether there is any e_copy of the book available somewhere?I wish I could translate the book into chinese and that may help people a lot！

thank u!!!






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
